scripts.schema-modules: git clone --recurse-submodules https://github.com/AskToMentor/asktomentor_dbschema.git && mkdir -p src/models && mv asktomentor_dbschema/src/models/* src/models && rm -rf asktomentor_dbschema/
scripts.schema-modules-window: git clone --recurse-submodules https://github.com/AskToMentor/asktomentor_dbschema.git && mkdir src\models && move asktomentor_dbschema\src\models\* src\models && rd /s /q asktomentor_dbschema\
